SELECT BILLINGCYCLID, PAY_CHNL_ID,PAY_CHNL_NAME,DEV_CHNL_ID, DEV_CHNL_NAME,REMARK1,SUM(FEE) COMM FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_COMM_2G_AUDIT WHERE BILLINGCYCLID=to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1), 'yyyymm') AND INIT_ID IS NULL
AND 1=2
AND GROUP_ID_1 = #{code}
GROUP BY PAY_CHNL_ID,BILLINGCYCLID,PAY_CHNL_NAME,DEV_CHNL_ID,DEV_CHNL_NAME,REMARK1
SELECT NVL(SUM(FEE),0) FEE FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_COMM_2G_AUDIT WHERE INIT_ID=#{workNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_COMM_2G_AUDIT WHERE BILLINGCYCLID=to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1), 'yyyymm') AND INIT_ID IS NULL AND GROUP_ID_1 = #{code} GROUP BY PAY_CHNL_ID,BILLINGCYCLID,PAY_CHNL_NAME

SELECT BILLINGCYCLID, PAY_CHNL_ID,PAY_CHNL_NAME,DEV_CHNL_ID, DEV_CHNL_NAME,REMARK1,SUM(FEE) COMM FROM PMRT.TAB_MRT_COMM_2G_AUDIT WHERE INIT_ID = #{businessKey} GROUP BY PAY_CHNL_ID,BILLINGCYCLID,PAY_CHNL_NAME,DEV_CHNL_ID,DEV_CHNL_NAME,REMARK1 ORDER BY BILLINGCYCLID
